structure.unit: SCHOOL EMPLOYEES -- TEACHERS' RETIREMENT AND TENURE

law.history: Repealed 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 43, sec. 23. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 18. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 3. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 1. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4506b-44.
